survey_brief: This survey aims to understand the factors influencing gym membership retention and identify areas for improvement to enhance member satisfaction and loyalty.

questions.question_text: How long have you been a member at this gym?
questions.client_notes: Use single-choice radio buttons. This question helps segment respondents by tenure.

script.question_text: How long have you been a member at this gym?

questions.question_text: What factors influenced your decision to join this gym? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes (MULTI_CHOICE). Include an 'Other' option with a text field for unique responses.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox (MULTI_CHOICE) with optional open-text for 'Other'

script.question_text: What factors influenced your decision to join this gym? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How likely are you to renew your membership when it expires?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale (SINGLE_CHOICE) to gauge retention intent.

script.question_text: How likely are you to renew your membership when it expires?

questions.question_text: What improvements would make you more likely to continue your membership?
questions.routing_logic: Appears if Q3 answer is 'Somewhat unlikely' or 'Very unlikely'
questions.client_notes: Open-text field to capture qualitative feedback. Useful for identifying churn drivers.

script.question_text: What improvements would make you more likely to continue your membership?
script.routing_logic: Appears if Q3 answer is 'Somewhat unlikely' or 'Very unlikely'

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the cleanliness and maintenance of the gym facilities?
questions.client_notes: 5-point satisfaction scale (SINGLE_CHOICE). Hygiene is a critical retention factor.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the cleanliness and maintenance of the gym facilities?

questions.question_text: Which of the following amenities do you use regularly? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Checkbox options (MULTI_CHOICE) to identify underutilized amenities.

script.question_text: Which of the following amenities do you use regularly? (Select all that apply)
